attributes.title: Not part of gen z thing
attributes.review: I reall generally don’t like this app, it doesn’t tell me about anything I need to know. It just doesn’t hit the mark.

attributes.title: What???!!!
attributes.review: First of all when I downloaded the app it made me put my number a whole bunch of other stuff like what?

attributes.title: One star 🙌🏽
attributes.review: Why would you hate Mexicans! You grow up and you hate Mexicans and black people!??! We need a better president. And why TikTok!?! We all love TikTok and u want to delete it!? 😩

attributes.title: Horrible...
attributes.review: This app is the reason I had to get a new phone. Glitchy, kicks me out of the app. I’m pretty sure my phone was hacked because of this app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD
Literally as soon as I downloaded this app my std tests came back and they came back positive for ✨herpes✨ I do not think this is a coincidence, this app gives you ✨herpes✨

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: This app is the worst app I’ve ever seen. It glitches, shuts down, and it makes disgusting and ignorant comments about almost every subject.

attributes.userName: ion know i just work here
attributes.title: do not recommend
attributes.review: the formatting is terrible and it makes it very hard to get up to date news about our presidents campaign. it constantly glitches and forces you back to your home screen. our president deserves a better app than this one. very disappointed.

attributes.title: ✨omg✨
attributes.review: After taking like an hour to download it kept making my phone crash, like omg. im just trying to know why to vote for trump. i guess i shouldnt. ✨💕

attributes.title: 0/10 would NeVEr recommend
attributes.review:
This noise inside of this app is astronomical. Like what is going on in there some mutated tide pods r really partying it up in there. They need mask requirements for this app but for ur eyes. 
- Gen Z ✨🧚🏻🌞

attributes.title: Trashy horrid app with crashes and bugs
attributes.review: This app is awful and if you think to download it... you should rethink that. It achieves virtually NOTHING and does not deserve to be on the App Store.
